prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: To adopt a shelf, fill out a form at the bottom of the article specifying the desired shelf, quantity, and rental period. The company will then contact you to finalize details.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Title should be concise and clear
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
